articles.title: Romence Dilbilgisi Temelleri: Partnerinizle Birlikte Kolayca √ñƒürenin
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import ConjugationTable from '@components/ConjugationTable.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Romence √∂ƒürenmek, partnerinizle daha derin bir baƒü kurmanƒ±n en g√ºzel yollarƒ±ndan biri. Bu temel dilbilgisi rehberiyle, birlikte √∂ƒürenirken romantik anlar yaratacaksƒ±nƒ±z. Bu yazƒ±nƒ±n sonunda, partnerinize basit ama etkileyici c√ºmleler kurabilecek ve [Romence'de 'Seni seviyorum' nasƒ±l s√∂ylenir](/learn/tr/ro/how-to-say-i-love-you-in-romanian/) konusunda uzman olacaksƒ±nƒ±z!

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Te iubesc"
  translation="Seni seviyorum"
  pronunciation="teh yoo-BESK"
  context="Romence'de en romantik ifade - her g√ºn kullanacaƒüƒ±nƒ±z!"
/>

## Romence Dilbilgisi: Korkmayƒ±n, √áok Mantƒ±klƒ±!

Romence, Latin k√∂kenli bir dil olduƒüu i√ßin T√ºrk√ßeden farklƒ± yapƒ±lara sahip. Ama merak etmeyin! Temel kurallarƒ± √∂ƒürendikten sonra, her ≈üey yerine oturuyor. En g√ºzel yanƒ±? Romence telaffuzu yazƒ±mƒ±na √ßok yakƒ±n - ne yazarsanƒ±z, onu okuyorsunuz.

Romence c√ºmleler genellikle T√ºrk√ße gibi √∂zne-nesne-y√ºklem sƒ±rasƒ±yla kurulur. Bu da size b√ºy√ºk bir avantaj saƒülar!

## 5 Temel Kural (Bunlarƒ± Biliyorsanƒ±z, √áoƒüu ƒ∞≈ü Halloluyor!)

### 1. Cinsiyet Var, Ama Karma≈üƒ±k Deƒüil
Romence'de isimler **eril (masculin)** veya **di≈üil (feminin)** olur. Genellikle -a ile bitenler di≈üil, -u/-e/-consonant ile bitenler erildir:

- **fatƒÉ** (kƒ±z) - di≈üil
- **baiat** (erkek √ßocuk) - eril
- **iubire** (a≈ük) - di≈üil

### 2. Artikeller (Belirli/Belirsiz)
**Belirli artikel "the":**
- Eril: **-ul** (baiatul - the boy)
- Di≈üil: **-ua** (fata - the girl)

**Belirsiz artikel "a/an":**
- **un** (eril), **o** (di≈üil)
- un bƒÉiat (bir erkek √ßocuk), o fatƒÉ (bir kƒ±z)

### 3. Fiil √áekimi - Sadece 3 ≈ûahƒ±s √ñƒürenin
En √∂nemli fiil **"a fi"** (olmak):

<ConjugationTable
  verb="a fi"
  meaning="olmak"
  conjugations={[
    { person: "Ben", polish: "eu sunt", english: "I am" },
    { person: "Sen", polish: "tu e»ôti", english: "you are" },
    { person: "O", polish: "el/ea este", english: "he/she is" },
    { person: "Biz", polish: "noi suntem", english: "we are" },
    { person: "Siz", polish: "voi sunte»õi", english: "you are" },
    { person: "Onlar", polish: "ei/ele sunt", english: "they are" }
  ]}
/>

### 4. √áoƒüul Yapmak √áok Kolay
Genellikle sonuna **-i** veya **-e** ekleyerek √ßoƒüul yapƒ±lƒ±r:
- fatƒÉ ‚Üí fete (kƒ±zlar)
- bƒÉiat ‚Üí bƒÉie»õi (erkek √ßocuklar)
- iubire ‚Üí iubiri (a≈üklar)

### 5. Soru Sormak ƒ∞√ßin √ñzel Kural Yok
T√ºrk√ße gibi, c√ºmle yapƒ±sƒ±nƒ± deƒüi≈ütirmeden soru sorabilirsiniz. Sadece ses tonunuzu y√ºkseltin:
- **Tu e»ôti fericit.** (Sen mutlusun.) ‚Üí **Tu e»ôti fericit?** (Sen mutlu musun?)

<VocabCard
  word="fericit/fericitƒÉ"
  translation="mutlu"
  pronunciation="feh-ree-CHEET/feh-ree-CHEE-tah"
  example="Sunt fericit cƒÉ te am. (Seni olduƒüun i√ßin mutluyum.)"
/>

## Partnerinizle G√ºnl√ºk Konu≈ümalar ƒ∞√ßin Tablo

| Romence | T√ºrk√ße | Kullanƒ±m Notu |
|---------|---------|---------------|
| **BunƒÉ, dragule!** | Merhaba, sevgilim! | Erkeƒüe hitap |
| **BunƒÉ, drƒÉgu»õƒÉ!** | Merhaba, sevgilim! | Kadƒ±na hitap |
| **Ce faci?** | Ne yapƒ±yorsun? | G√ºnl√ºk selamla≈üma |
| **Sunt bine.** | ƒ∞yiyim. | Cevap olarak |
| **Te iubesc mult.** | Seni √ßok seviyorum. | Romantik ifade |
| **E»ôti frumoasƒÉ.** | G√ºzelsin. | Kadƒ±na iltifat |
| **E»ôti frumos.** | Yakƒ±≈üƒ±klƒ±sƒ±n. | Erkeƒüe iltifat |

<CultureTip flag="üá∑üá¥" title="Romantik Notlar">
Romence konu≈üanlar, partnerlerine hitap ederken **"dragul meu"** (benim sevgilim - erkek) veya **"draga mea"** (benim sevgilim - kadƒ±n) gibi ifadeleri sƒ±k kullanƒ±r. Bu [tatlƒ± lakaplar](/learn/tr/ro/romanian-pet-names-for-your-partner/) k√ºlt√ºrde √ßok yaygƒ±ndƒ±r!
</CultureTip>

## En Yaygƒ±n Kalƒ±plar (Hemen Kullanmaya Ba≈ülayƒ±n!)

### G√ºnl√ºk ƒ∞fadeler
1. **BunƒÉ diminea»õa** (Buna diminyeatsa) - G√ºnaydƒ±n
2. **Noapte bunƒÉ** (Noapte buna) - ƒ∞yi geceler
3. **Mul»õumesc** (Mul»õumesk) - Te≈üekk√ºrler
4. **Cu plƒÉcere** (Ku pleachere) - Rica ederim
5. **Te rog** (Te rog) - L√ºtfen (informal)

### Romantik Kalƒ±plar
1. **√émi e»ôti dor.** (√ém yasht dor) - Seni √∂zl√ºyorum.
2. **E»ôti special(ƒÉ) pentru mine.** (Yasht special/pentru mine) - Benim i√ßin √∂zelsin.
3. **Vreau sƒÉ fiu cu tine.** (Vreow sah feeu ku tine) - Seninle olmak istiyorum.

<VocabCard
  word="dor"
  translation="√∂zlem"
  pronunciation="dor"
  example="Mi-e dor de tine. (Seni √∂zl√ºyorum.)"
/>

## Pratik C√ºmleler - Partnerinizle Konu≈üun!

1. **Unde vrei sƒÉ m√¢ncƒÉm azi?** (Unde vreiy sah muncum azi?) - Bug√ºn nerede yemek yemek istersin?
2. **E»ôti liber(ƒÉ) disearƒÉ?** (Yasht liber/liberah disearah?) - Bu ak≈üam m√ºsaitsin?
3. **Ce film vrei sƒÉ vedem?** (Che film vreiy sah vedem?) - Hangi filmi izlemek istersin?
4. **√é»õi place muzica?** (√ét place muzika?) - M√ºzikten ho≈ülanƒ±yor musun?
5. **Vrei sƒÉ dansƒÉm?** (Vreiy sah duncum?) - Dans etmek ister misin?
6. **E»ôti obosit(ƒÉ)?** (Yasht obosit/obositah?) - Yorgun musun?
7. **Ce vrei sƒÉ facem weekend-ul?** (Che vreiy sah fuchem weekend-ul?) - Hafta sonu ne yapmak istersin?

## En Yaygƒ±n Hatalar (Siz Yapmayƒ±n!)

### 1. Cinsiyet Karƒ±≈üƒ±klƒ±ƒüƒ±
**Yanlƒ±≈ü:** *fatƒÉ frumos* (g√ºzel kƒ±z - eril sƒ±fat kullanƒ±lmƒ±≈ü)
**Doƒüru:** *fatƒÉ frumoasƒÉ* (g√ºzel kƒ±z - di≈üil sƒ±fat)

### 2. Artikel Unutkanlƒ±ƒüƒ±
**Yanlƒ±≈ü:** *VƒÉd fatƒÉ.* (Kƒ±z g√∂r√ºyorum.)
**Doƒüru:** *VƒÉd fata.* (Kƒ±zƒ± g√∂r√ºyorum.)

### 3. √áoƒüul Hatasƒ±
**Yanlƒ±≈ü:** *doi fete* (iki kƒ±z)
**Doƒüru:** *douƒÉ fete* (ƒ∞ki kƒ±z i√ßin "douƒÉ" kullanƒ±lƒ±r)

<CultureTip flag="üá∑üá¥" title="Romence Konu≈üurken">
Romanya'da insanlar, yabancƒ±larƒ±n Romence konu≈ümasƒ±na √ßok deƒüer verir. Hata yapsanƒ±z bile denemek, b√ºy√ºk takdir toplar. Partnerinizin ailesiyle tanƒ±≈üƒ±rken, [bu temel ifadeler](/learn/tr/ro/meeting-your-romanian-partners-family/) i≈üinize yarayacaktƒ±r!
</CultureTip>

## Hƒ±zlƒ± Bakƒ±≈ü Tablosu - Ekran G√∂r√ºnt√ºs√º Alƒ±n!

| T√ºrk√ße | Romence | Telaffuz |
|--------|---------|----------|
| Merhaba | BunƒÉ | Buna |
| G√ºle g√ºle | La revedere | La revedere |
| Evet | Da | Da |
| Hayƒ±r | Nu | Nu |
| Belki | Poate | Poate |
| Sevgilim | Iubit/iubitƒÉ | Yubit/Yubitah |
| √ñp√ºc√ºk | SƒÉrut | SƒÉrut |
| Kalp | InimƒÉ | Inimah |

## Sƒ±rada Ne Var?

Tebrikler! Romence dilbilgisinin temellerini √∂ƒürendiniz. ≈ûimdi:

1. **[Temel selamla≈ümalarƒ±](/learn/tr/ro/romanian-greetings-and-farewells/)** √∂ƒürenerek pratiƒüe ba≈ülayƒ±n
2. **[Romantik ifadeler](/learn/tr/ro/romantic-romanian-phrases-for-every-occasion/)** koleksiyonumuzu ke≈üfedin
3. Partnerinizle birlikte g√ºnl√ºk 15 dakika pratik yapƒ±n - birlikte √∂ƒürenmek √ßok daha eƒülenceli!

Unutmayƒ±n, dil √∂ƒürenmek bir yolculuk. Partnerinizle birlikte bu yolda ilerlerken, her yeni kelime ve c√ºmle sizi birbirinize daha da yakƒ±nla≈ütƒ±racak.

import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

–ü—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ l'anniversaire de mariage –Ω–∞ —Ñ—Ä–∞–Ω—Ü—É–∑—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫–µ –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–µ–∫—Ä–∞—Å–Ω—ã–π —Å–º—ã—Å–ª —ç—Ç–æ–º—É –æ—Å–æ–±–æ–º—É —Å–ª—É—á–∞—é. –ë—É–¥—å —Ç–æ –≤–∞—à –ø–µ—Ä–≤—ã–π –≥–æ–¥ ensemble –∏–ª–∏ –∑–æ–ª–æ—Ç–∞—è l'anniversaire de mariage, –≤—ã—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞—à–µ–π l'amour –Ω–∞ —è–∑—ã–∫–µ –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ë—Ä–∞ –¥–µ–º–æ–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç –∑–∞–±–æ—Ç—É –∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –≤–∞—à–∏–º –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è–º.

–î–ª—è –ø–æ–≤—Å–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –≤—ã—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –æ–∑–Ω–∞–∫–æ–º—å—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –Ω–∞—à–∏–º —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º [—Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑—ã –Ω–∞ —Ñ—Ä–∞–Ω—Ü—É–∑—Å–∫–∏–π –Ω–∞ –≤—Å–µ —Å–ª—É—á–∞–∏ –∂–∏–∑–Ω–∏](/blog/ru/french-romantic-phrases-for-every-occasion).

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Joyeux anniversaire de mariage"
  translation="–° –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–æ–π"
  pronunciation="Joyeux anniversaire de mariage"
  context="–ò–¥–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–± –ø–æ–ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ë—Ä–∞ –≤ –≤–∞—à –æ—Å–æ–±—ã–π –¥–µ–Ω—å."
/>

## –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–∞—è –ª–µ–∫—Å–∏–∫–∞ –¥–ª—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω—ã

<VocabCard
  word="l'anniversaire de mariage"
  translation="–≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞"
  pronunciation="l'anniversaire de mariage"
  example="–°–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è –Ω–∞—à–∞ l'anniversaire de mariage!"
/>

| French | –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π | –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ |
|---|---|---|
| l'anniversaire de mariage | –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞ | –û—Å–æ–±–∞—è –¥–∞—Ç–∞ |
| ans | –≥–æ–¥—ã | –í—Ä–µ–º—è –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ |
| ensemble | –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ | –ï–¥–∏–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ –∫–∞–∫ –ø–∞—Ä–∞ |
| toujours | –Ω–∞–≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ | –í–µ—á–Ω–∞—è –ª—é–±–æ–≤—å |
| l'amour | –ª—é–±–æ–≤—å | –í–∞—à–∞ —Å–≤—è–∑—å |
| f√™ter | –ø—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å | –û—Ç–º–µ—á–∞—Ç—å –¥–µ–Ω—å |
| le souvenir | –≤–æ—Å–ø–æ–º–∏–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ | –î–æ—Ä–æ–≥–∏–µ –º–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã |
| l'√©tape | –≤–µ—Ö–∞ | –í–∞–∂–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–º–µ—Ç–∫–∏ |

<CultureTip flag="üá´üá∑" title="–¢—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü–∏–∏ –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω—ã">
–í –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–∞—Ö, –≥–¥–µ –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä—è—Ç –Ω–∞ —Ñ—Ä–∞–Ω—Ü—É–∑—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫–µ, –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω—ã —á–∞—Å—Ç–æ –æ—Ç–º–µ—á–∞—é—Ç—Å—è —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–º–∏ —É–∂–∏–Ω–∞–º–∏, –∑–Ω–∞—á–∏–º—ã–º–∏ –ø–æ–¥–∞—Ä–∫–∞–º–∏, –∞ –∏–Ω–æ–≥–¥–∞ –∏ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –∫–ª—è—Ç–≤. –ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π —é–±–∏–ª–µ–π–Ω—ã–π –≥–æ–¥ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –∏–º–µ—Ç—å —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Ç–µ–º—ã –ø–æ–¥–∞—Ä–∫–æ–≤.
</CultureTip>

## –ü—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—ã–µ –ø–æ–∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω—É

### –ö–æ—Ä–æ—Ç–∫–∏–µ –∏ —Å–ª–∞–¥–∫–∏–µ
- **Joyeux anniversaire de mariage!** - –° –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–æ–π!
- **–ï—â—ë –æ–¥–∏–Ω –ø—Ä–µ–∫—Ä–∞—Å–Ω—ã–π –≥–æ–¥ ensemble!** - –ü—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏ –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ
- **–ó–∞ –µ—â—ë –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ ans!** - –°–º–æ—Ç—Ä—è –≤–ø–µ—Ä—ë–¥

### –î–ª—è –≤–∞—à–µ–≥–æ –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ë—Ä–∞
- **–¢—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ—à—å –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –¥–µ–Ω—å –æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º** - –í—ã—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –±–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏
- **l'amour —Ç–µ–±—è –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ —Å –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–º –¥–Ω—ë–º** - –†–∞—Å—Ç—É—â–∞—è –ª—é–±–æ–≤—å
- **–ú–æ—ë —Å–µ—Ä–¥—Ü–µ toujours —Ç–≤–æ—ë** - –í–µ—á–Ω–∞—è –ø—Ä–µ–¥–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å

<VocabCard
  word="l'amour"
  translation="–ª—é–±–æ–≤—å"
  pronunciation="l'amour"
  example="l'amour —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—Å—è —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω–µ–µ –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –≥–æ–¥."
/>

## –†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –ø–æ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω—É

### –°–µ—Ä–¥–µ—á–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è
**"–ö–∞–∂–¥–∞—è l'anniversaire de mariage —Å —Ç–æ–±–æ–π –Ω–∞–ø–æ–º–∏–Ω–∞–µ—Ç –º–Ω–µ, –ø–æ—á–µ–º—É —è –≤—ã–±—Ä–∞–ª(–∞) —Ç–µ–±—è. –¢—ã –º–æ—ë toujours."**

**"ensemble –º—ã —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–ª–∏ –ø—Ä–µ–∫—Ä–∞—Å–Ω—É—é –∂–∏–∑–Ω—å. –ó–∞ –µ—â—ë –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ ans l'amour."**

### –ó–∞–¥—É–º—á–∏–≤—ã–µ –ø–æ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–∏—è
**"–í—Å–ø–æ–º–∏–Ω–∞—è –Ω–∞—à–∏ le souvenir, –º–æ—ë —Å–µ—Ä–¥—Ü–µ –Ω–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ—Ç—Å—è —Ä–∞–¥–æ—Å—Ç—å—é. –°–ø–∞—Å–∏–±–æ, —á—Ç–æ —Ç—ã –µ—Å—Ç—å."**

**"–ö–∞–∂–¥–∞—è l'√©tape, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—É—é –º—ã –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∏–≥–∞–µ–º –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ, –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞—à—É —Å–≤—è–∑—å –∫—Ä–µ–ø—á–µ. –Ø ch√©rir –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –º–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç —Å —Ç–æ–±–æ–π."**

<CultureTip flag="üá´üá∑" title="–ù–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —é–±–∏–ª–µ–µ–≤">
–†–∞–∑–Ω—ã–µ l'anniversaire de mariage ans –∏–º–µ—é—Ç —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è: –ø–µ—Ä–≤–∞—è (–±—É–º–∞–∂–Ω–∞—è), –ø—è—Ç–∞—è (–¥–µ—Ä–µ–≤—è–Ω–Ω–∞—è), –¥–µ—Å—è—Ç–∞—è (–æ–ª–æ–≤—è–Ω–Ω–∞—è), –¥–≤–∞–¥—Ü–∞—Ç—å –ø—è—Ç–∞—è (—Å–µ—Ä–µ–±—Ä—è–Ω–∞—è) –∏ –ø—è—Ç–∏–¥–µ—Å—è—Ç–∞—è (–∑–æ–ª–æ—Ç–∞—è). –≠—Ç–∏ —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü–∏–∏ —Å—Ö–æ–∂–∏ –≤–æ –º–Ω–æ–≥–∏—Ö —Ä–µ–≥–∏–æ–Ω–∞—Ö, –≥–¥–µ –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä—è—Ç –Ω–∞ —Ñ—Ä–∞–Ω—Ü—É–∑—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫–µ.
</CultureTip>

## –ü–æ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø–æ –≥–æ–¥–∞–º

### –ü–µ—Ä–≤–∞—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞
**"–û–¥–∏–Ω –≥–æ–¥ l'amour, —Å–º–µ—Ö–∞ –∏ —Å—á–∞—Å—Ç—å—è. –ü–µ—Ä–≤—ã–π –∏–∑ –º–Ω–æ–≥–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–µ–∫—Ä–∞—Å–Ω—ã—Ö ans ensemble!"**

### –ü—è—Ç–∞—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞
**"–ü—è—Ç—å ans —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è le souvenir –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ. –¢—ã –≤—Å—ë –µ—â—ë –≤—ã–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ—à—å —É –º–µ–Ω—è –±–∞–±–æ—á–µ–∫ –≤ –∂–∏–≤–æ—Ç–µ."**

### –î–µ—Å—è—Ç–∞—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞
**"–î–µ—Å—è—Ç–∏–ª–µ—Ç–∏–µ l'amour! –ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –¥–µ–Ω—å —Å —Ç–æ–±–æ–π ‚Äî –ø–æ–¥–∞—Ä–æ–∫, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π —è ch√©rir."**

### –î–≤–∞–¥—Ü–∞—Ç—å –ø—è—Ç–∞—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞ (—Å–µ—Ä–µ–±—Ä—è–Ω–∞—è)
**"–î–≤–∞–¥—Ü–∞—Ç—å –ø—è—Ç—å ans l'amour –∏ —ç—Ç–æ —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–æ. –¢—ã –º–æ—è –≤–µ–ª–∏—á–∞–π—à–∞—è l'√©tape."**

### –ü—è—Ç–∏–¥–µ—Å—è—Ç–∞—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞ (–∑–æ–ª–æ—Ç–∞—è)
**"–ü—è—Ç—å–¥–µ—Å—è—Ç ans ensemble ‚Äî –∑–æ–ª–æ—Ç–∞—è –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è l'amour. –¢—ã –º–æ—ë toujours."**

## –†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑—ã –¥–ª—è –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–æ–∫

| –°–ª—É—á–∞–π | –ü–æ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞ French | –ó–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ |
|---|---|---|
| –õ—é–±–æ–π –≥–æ–¥ | Joyeux anniversaire de mariage –º–æ—è l'amour | –° –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–æ–π, –ª—é–±–æ–≤—å –º–æ—è |
| –ü–µ—Ä–≤—ã–π –≥–æ–¥ | –ù–∞—à–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–≤–∞—è l'anniversaire de mariage! | –ü—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–≥–æ –≥–æ–¥–∞ |
| –û—Å–æ–±—ã–π –≥–æ–¥ | l'√©tape l'anniversaire de mariage | –í–∞–∂–Ω–∞—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞ |
| –ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –≥–æ–¥ | toujours ensemble | –í–µ—á–Ω–æ–µ –µ–¥–∏–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ |

## –ü–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω—ã

### –†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –∏–¥–µ–∏
1. –ù–∞–ø–∏—à–∏—Ç–µ –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∫—É –Ω–∞ —Ñ—Ä–∞–Ω—Ü—É–∑—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫–µ
2. –í—ã—É—á–∏—Ç–µ –ø–µ—Å–Ω—é –æ –ª—é–±–≤–∏ –Ω–∞ —Ñ—Ä–∞–Ω—Ü—É–∑—Å–∫–∏–π
3. –ü—Ä–∏–≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤—å—Ç–µ —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —É–∂–∏–Ω
4. –°–ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä—É–π—Ç–µ –ø–æ–µ–∑–¥–∫—É –≤ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—É, –≥–¥–µ –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä—è—Ç –Ω–∞ —Ñ—Ä–∞–Ω—Ü—É–∑—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫–µ

### –í—ã—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –±–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏
- **–°–ø–∞—Å–∏–±–æ –∑–∞ –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –¥–µ–Ω—å** - –ó–∞ –µ–∂–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω—É—é —Ä–∞–¥–æ—Å—Ç—å
- **–Ø –±–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä–µ–Ω(–Ω–∞) –∑–∞ –Ω–∞—à—É –∂–∏–∑–Ω—å –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ** - –ó–∞ –≤–∞—à–µ –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ë—Ä—Å—Ç–≤–æ
- **–¢—ã ‚Äî –ª—É—á—à–µ–µ, —á—Ç–æ —Å–ª—É—á–∏–ª–æ—Å—å —Å–æ –º–Ω–æ–π** - –°–∞–º—ã–π –≥–ª—É–±–æ–∫–∏–π –∫–æ–º–ø–ª–∏–º–µ–Ω—Ç

## –°–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è —Å–æ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ç–µ–π

### –ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∏ –¥–ª—è –ø—É–±–ª–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–π
- **X ans —Å undefined** - –í–µ—Ö–∞
- **ensemble toujours** - –ü—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ–µ –∏ —Å–ª–∞–¥–∫–æ–µ
- **Joyeux anniversaire de mariage –º–æ–µ–π –≤—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–π –ø–æ–ª–æ–≤–∏–Ω–∫–µ** - –¢—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ

## –ö—Ä–∞—Ç–∫–∏–π —Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–æ—á–Ω–∏–∫

| –¶–µ–ª—å | –§—Ä–∞–∑–∞ |
|---|---|
| –ü—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ | Joyeux anniversaire de mariage! |
| –í—ã—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ª—é–±–≤–∏ | –Ø l'amour —Ç–µ–±—è |
| –°–º–æ—Ç—Ä—è –≤–ø–µ—Ä—ë–¥ | –ù–∞ —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–µ ans |
| –ü–æ—Å–≤—è—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ | ensemble toujours |

–ü—É—Å—Ç—å –∫–∞–∂–¥–∞—è l'anniversaire de mariage –Ω–∞ —Ñ—Ä–∞–Ω—Ü—É–∑—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫–µ –Ω–∞–ø–æ–º–∏–Ω–∞–µ—Ç –≤–∞–º –æ —Å–∏–ª–µ –≤–∞—à–µ–π l'amour. –°–ª–æ–≤–∞ –º–æ–≥—É—Ç —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –≤–æ—Å–ø–æ–º–∏–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—É—Ç—Å—è toujours.

articles.title: Ukr√°n baba √©s terhess√©gi sz√≥kincs
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';

import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

A baba √©rkez√©se az √©let egyik legcsod√°latosabb esem√©nye. Ha ukr√°nul szeretn√©l kommunik√°lni a terhess√©gr≈ël √©s a bab√°r√≥l, ezek a kifejez√©sek n√©lk√ºl√∂zhetetlenek.

Az alapvet≈ë kifejez√©sek√©rt n√©zd meg az [Ukr√°n alapvet≈ë kifejez√©sek](/learn/hu/uk/ukrainian-essential-phrases-for-couples) √∫tmutat√≥nkat.

<PhraseOfDay
  word="–í—ñ—Ç–∞—é!"
  translation="Gratul√°lok!"
  pronunciation=" ãiÀàt…êju"
  context="Az esk√ºv≈ëi k√∂sz√∂nt√©s alapja."
/>

## Alapvet≈ë sz√≥kincs

A baba √©s terhess√©g alapvet≈ë ukr√°n sz√≥kincse:

<VocabCard
  word="–≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è"
  translation="esk√ºv≈ë"
  pronunciation="Àà ã…õs ≤il ≤Àê…ê"
  example="–í–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è –±—É–ª–æ —á—É–¥–æ–≤–∏–º."
/>

| Ukr√°n | Magyar | Haszn√°lat |
|---|---|---|
| –Ω–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–∞ | menyasszony | A n≈ë |
| –Ω–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–π | v≈ëleg√©ny | A f√©rfi |
| –æ–±—ñ—Ç–Ω–∏—Ü—ñ | fogadalmak | Esk√ºv≈ëi √≠g√©retek |
| —Ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–æ–Ω—ñ—è | szertart√°s | A hivatalos r√©sz |
| –ø—Ä–∏–π–æ–º | fogad√°s | Az √ºnnepl√©s |
| —Ç–æ—Å—Ç | k√∂sz√∂nt≈ë | Poh√°rk√∂sz√∂nt≈ë |

<CultureTip flag="üåç" title="Ukr√°n kultur√°lis tippek">
A ukr√°n kult√∫r√°ban a terhess√©g √©s a baba √©rkez√©se k√∂r√ºl sok hagyom√°ny √©s babona l√©tezik. √ârdemes megismerni ezeket a p√°rod csal√°dj√°val.
</CultureTip>

## Hasznos kifejez√©sek

### Terhess√©gi kifejez√©sek

A v√°rand√≥ss√°g alatt hasznos kifejez√©sek:

- **Bab√°t v√°runk!** - A nagy bejelent√©s
- **Mikor a v√°rhat√≥ id≈ëpont?** - Gyakori k√©rd√©s
- **Fi√∫ vagy l√°ny?** - A nem ir√°nti √©rdekl≈ëd√©s

### Baba sz√≥kincs
Amikor meg√©rkezik a baba:

- **Megsz√ºletett a baba!** - Az √∂r√∂mh√≠r
- **Gratul√°lok!** - J√≥k√≠v√°ns√°g a sz√ºl≈ëknek

<VocabCard
  word="–º–µ–¥–æ–≤–∏–π –º—ñ—Å—è—Ü—å"
  translation="n√°sz√∫t"
  pronunciation="m…õÀàd…î ã…™j Ààm ≤is ≤…êts ≤"
  example="–í–æ–Ω–∏ –Ω–∞ –º–µ–¥–æ–≤–æ–º—É –º—ñ—Å—è—Ü—ñ."
/>

## Gyakorlati helyzetek

| Helyzet | Mit mondj |
|---|---|
| Bejelent√©s | Bab√°t v√°runk! |
| Orvosn√°l | K√©rdezz a terhess√©gr≈ël |
| Sz√ºlet√©sn√©l | A baba megsz√ºletett! |
| Gratul√°ci√≥k | Fogadd a j√≥k√≠v√°ns√°gokat |

<CultureTip flag="üí°" title="Hasznos tipp">
A terhess√©g alatt sok √∫j sz√≥val tal√°lkozol. K√©sz√≠ts list√°t az orvosi kifejez√©sekr≈ël, hogy az id≈ëpontok sor√°n magabiztosabban kommunik√°lhass.
</CultureTip>

## √ñsszefoglal√≥ t√°bl√°zat

| Helyzet | Ukr√°n kifejez√©s |
|---|---|
| Gratul√°ci√≥ | –í—ñ—Ç–∞—é! |
| Az esem√©ny | –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è |
| A n≈ë | –Ω–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–∞ |
| A f√©rfi | –Ω–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–π |
| Esk√ºv≈ëi √≠g√©retek | –æ–±—ñ—Ç–Ω–∏—Ü—ñ |

## Tov√°bbi tanul√°s

Ha tov√°bb szeretn√©d fejleszteni a ukr√°n nyelvtud√°sod, n√©zd meg ezeket a cikkeinket:

- [Ukr√°n romantikus kifejez√©sek minden alkalomra](/learn/hu/uk/ukrainian-romantic-phrases-for-every-occasion)
- [Hogyan mondd: Szeretlek ukr√°nul](/learn/hu/uk/ukrainian-how-to-say-i-love-you)
- [Ukr√°n alapvet≈ë kifejez√©sek p√°roknak](/learn/hu/uk/ukrainian-essential-phrases-for-couples)

Ezek a forr√°sok seg√≠tenek elm√©ly√≠teni a tud√°sod √©s magabiztosabb√° v√°lni a ukr√°n nyelvben.

articles.title: Polish Jealousy & Trust Phrases for English Speakers
articles.content:
Jealousy and trust are important topics in any relationship. When you're with a Polish speaker, knowing how to discuss these feelings in their language shows emotional commitment. Here are essential Polish phrases for these sensitive conversations.

## Expressing Jealousy

### Jestem zazdrosny/zazdrosna
**Pronunciation:** YES-tem zahz-DROH-snuy/zahz-DROH-snah

**Meaning:** "I'm jealous"

**When to use it:** To honestly admit your feelings. Use "zazdrosny" if male, "zazdrosna" if female.

### Robiƒô siƒô zazdrosny/a, kiedy...
**Pronunciation:** ROH-byeh shyeh zahz-DROH-snuy/nah, KYEH-duy

**Meaning:** "I get jealous when..."

**When to use it:** To explain your triggers.

**Example:** "Robiƒô siƒô zazdrosna, kiedy spƒôdzasz du≈ºo czasu z niƒÖ." (I get jealous when you spend a lot of time with her.)

### Nie podoba mi siƒô ta zazdro≈õƒá, kt√≥rƒÖ czujƒô
**Pronunciation:** nyeh poh-DOH-bah mee shyeh tah ZAHZ-drohshch, KTOO-rohng CHOO-yeh

**Meaning:** "I don't like this jealousy I feel"

**When to use it:** To show self-awareness.

## Seeking Reassurance

### Czy kochasz tylko mnie?
**Pronunciation:** chuy KOH-hahsh TUL-koh mnyeh

**Meaning:** "Do you love only me?"

**When to use it:** When seeking reassurance.

### Potrzebujƒô, ≈ºeby≈õ mnie uspokoi≈Ç/a
**Pronunciation:** poh-TZHEH-boo-yeh, ZHEH-buish mnyeh oos-poh-KOH-eel/ah

**Meaning:** "I need you to reassure me"

**When to use it:** When asking for comfort.

### Czy mo≈ºesz mi pom√≥c poczuƒá siƒô bezpieczniej?
**Pronunciation:** chuy MOH-zhesh mee POH-moots POH-chooch shyeh bez-pyech-NYEY

**Meaning:** "Can you help me feel safer?"

**When to use it:** To ask for support.

## Building Trust

### Ufam ci
**Pronunciation:** OO-fahm chee

**Meaning:** "I trust you"

**When to use it:** To express trust directly.

### Chcƒô ci ca≈Çkowicie zaufaƒá
**Pronunciation:** htseh chee tsahl-koh-VEE-chyeh zah-OO-fahch

**Meaning:** "I want to trust you completely"

**When to use it:** When building deeper trust.

### Jak mo≈ºemy zbudowaƒá wiƒôcej zaufania?
**Pronunciation:** yahk moh-ZHEH-muy zboo-DOH-vahch VYEHN-tsey zah-oo-FAH-nyah

**Meaning:** "How can we build more trust?"

**When to use it:** To strengthen trust together.

## Giving Reassurance

### Mam oczy tylko dla ciebie
**Pronunciation:** mahm OH-chuy TUL-koh dlah CHYEH-byeh

**Meaning:** "I only have eyes for you"

**When to use it:** A romantic reassurance.

### Jeste≈õ jedynƒÖ/jedynym dla mnie
**Pronunciation:** YES-tehsh yeh-DUI-nohng/yeh-DUI-nuim dlah mnyeh

**Meaning:** "You're the only one for me"

**When to use it:** To affirm commitment.

### Nie masz siƒô o co martwiƒá
**Pronunciation:** nyeh mahsh shyeh oh tsoh MAHRT-veech

**Meaning:** "You have nothing to worry about"

**When to use it:** To calm concerns.

### Moje serce nale≈ºy do ciebie
**Pronunciation:** MOH-yeh SEHR-tseh nah-LEH-zhuy doh CHYEH-byeh

**Meaning:** "My heart belongs to you"

**When to use it:** A romantic declaration.

## Setting Healthy Boundaries

### Zazdro≈õƒá wp≈Çywa na nasz zwiƒÖzek
**Pronunciation:** ZAHZ-drohshch VPWUI-vah nah nahsh ZVYOHN-zek

**Meaning:** "Jealousy is affecting our relationship"

**When to use it:** When jealousy becomes problematic.

### Potrzebujƒô swojej przestrzeni
**Pronunciation:** poh-TZHEH-boo-yeh SVOH-yey psheh-STZHEH-nyee

**Meaning:** "I need my own space"

**When to use it:** To establish boundaries.

### Zaufanie jest dla mnie wa≈ºne
**Pronunciation:** zah-oo-FAH-nyeh yest dlah mnyeh VAHZH-neh

**Meaning:** "Trust is important to me"

**When to use it:** To express your values.

## Cultural Considerations

Polish culture values emotional depth in relationships. Discussing feelings like jealousy openly shows trust and commitment.

"Zaufanie" (trust) is built through loyalty, consistency, and standing by your partner through difficulties.

Family bonds are strong in Polish culture. Showing commitment and reliability matters deeply.

## Nurturing Trust

Discussing jealousy in Polish shows your willingness to work through challenges together. "Zaufanie buduje siƒô z czasem" (Trust is built over time).

articles.title: Rom√°n kifejez√©sek f√©lt√©kenys√©ghez √©s bizalomhoz
articles.content:
A rom√°n kult√∫ra latin temperamentummal kezeli az √©rzelmeket. Ha rom√°n anyanyelv≈± partnered van, ezek a kifejez√©sek seg√≠tenek.

## Kifejez√©sek a f√©lt√©kenys√©ghez

### 1. "Sunt gelos/geloasƒÉ c√¢nd tu..."
**Kiejt√©s:** Szunt zselos/zselo√°s√∂ k√Ænd tu

**Jelent√©s:** F√©lt√©keny vagyok, amikor te...

### 2. "Am nevoie sƒÉ mƒÉ lini»ôte»ôti"
**Kiejt√©s:** Am nevoje sz√∂ m√∂ linyisteszty

**Jelent√©s:** Sz√ºks√©gem van r√°, hogy megnyugtass

### 3. "Am √Æncredere √Æn tine, dar mƒÉ lupt cu sentimentele mele"
**Kiejt√©s:** Am √Ænkredere √Æn tyine, dar m√∂ lupt ku szentimentele mele

**Jelent√©s:** Megb√≠zom benned, de k√ºzd√∂k az √©rz√©seimmel

### 4. "Putem vorbi despre ce s-a √Ænt√¢mplat?"
**Kiejt√©s:** Putem vorbi deszpre cse sza √Ænt√Æmplat

**Jelent√©s:** Besz√©lhet√ºnk arr√≥l, ami t√∂rt√©nt?

### 5. "Nu vreau sƒÉ fiu gelos/geloasƒÉ, dar..."
